Methods.Description: Get a List of All Absences between two dates, since last run.

Methods.Description: Update an Absence.

Methods.Description: Delete an Absence by ID.

Methods.Description: Get existing tags of a specific location from your Papershift account

Methods.Name: Get Shift
Methods.Description: Get Shift by its unique ID or external ID.

Methods.Description: Get existing Shift(s) in range from your Papershift Account

Methods.Name: Get Updated Shifts
Methods.Description: Get Recently Updated Shifts, dating back to a year ago, or 3 years in the future.

Methods.Name: Get Shifts for Period
Methods.Description: Get all Shifts due to take place in the specified period.

Methods.Name: Get New Shifts
Methods.Description: Get Recently Added Shifts, dating back to a year ago, or 3 years in the future.

Methods.Description: Creates a new Shift in your Papershift Account.

Methods.Description: Update an existing Shift in your Papershift Account.

Methods.Description: Delete an existing Shift in your Papershift Account.

Methods.Description: Get all Assignments on an existing Shift.

Methods.Description: Get all Assignments on an existing Shift updated since last run.

Methods.Description: Assign a User to an existing Shift in your Papershift Account.

Methods.Name: Remove User from Shift
Methods.Description: Remove User Assignment from Shift
